creator: tobiasreif@pinkjuice.com
text:
Hi,

sorry if this has been reported already.

I use FOP 0.20.5 to convert
http://www.pinkjuice.com/howto/vimxml/print/vimxml_fop.fo
to
http://www.pinkjuice.com/howto/vimxml/print/vimxml.pdf .
The first bookmark labeled with the book's title doesn't point to the book's
title (cover).

Also see this post
http://sources.redhat.com/ml/docbook-apps/2003-q3/msg00622.html
with thread
http://sources.redhat.com/ml/docbook-apps/2003-q3/threads.html#00622

Tobi

creator: pascal.sancho@takoma.fr
text: Fixed in FOP 0.94 and probably earlier versions

creator: gadams@apache.org
text: batch transition pre-FOP1.0 resolved+fixed bugs to closed+fixed
